DOC.brief_summary: The mai purpose study evaluate safety establish recommend dose iHIVARNA-01 new therapeutic vaccine HIV
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I , Open Label Dose Escalation Study Evaluate Safety iHIVARNA-01 Chronically HIV-infected Patients Under Stable Combined Antiretroviral Therapy
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient ≥ 18 year age 2 . Voluntarily sign informed consent 3 . Patient male , female negative pregnancy test prior enrolment 4 . Patient proven HIV1 infection ( positive antibody HIV1 detectable plasma HIV1 RNA cART ) 5 . Patient must stable treatment cART least 6 month ( cART define antiretroviral regimen consist least three registered antiretroviral agent ) 6 . Nadir CD4+ cell count must equal 350 cells/μl ( 1 2 occasional determination 350 allow ) 7 . Current CD4+ cell count must least 450 cells/μl 8 . HIVRNA must 50 copies/ mL last 6 month prior inclusion , least two measurement ( occasional call 'blips ' 50 copies/mL permit ) 1 . Treatment noncART regimen antiretroviral agent prior start cART ; 2 . History CDC class C event ( see Appendix V ) ; 3 . Patient female positive pregnancy test wish pregnancy : 4 . Active opportunistic infection , active infection malignancy within 30 day prior screen visit ; 5 . Therapy immunomodulatory agent , include cytokine ( e.g . IL2 ) gamma globulin , cytostatic chemotherapy within 90 day prior screen visit ; 6 . Use anticoagulant medication ; 7 . Use investigational drug 90 day prior study entry ; 8 . Previous failure antiretroviral and/or mutation confer genotypic resistance antiretroviral therapy EudraCT No . 201400459132 33 Protocol version 1.1 , date 10 February 2015 9 . Any condition , opinion investigator , may interfere evaluation study objective . 10 . Active hepatitis C virus hepatitis B virus coinfection 11 . Nonsubtype B HIV infection
